parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Pre-defined variable for the independent [[Side|side]].
<br> Alias for [[resistance]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''independent'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQF:<code>[[if]] (([[side]] _unit) == [[independent]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "This is a independent unit!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[side]], [[civilian]], [[blufor]], [[east]], [[opfor]], [[resistance]], [[west]]
</value></part></template></root>
